content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) with fuel (coal) and iron ore being processed into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 1.0) with fuel (coal) and iron ore being processed into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (3.0, 1.0) for automated insertion of iron ore into the furnace.

### Storage Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, 1.5) for storing iron plates.

### Transport Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs and outputs connecting various positions, including:
  - Belt from (x=-11.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-50.5) moving left.
  - Belt from (x=-13.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-52.5) moving up.
  - Belt from (x=-12.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-12.5, y=-52.5) moving up.
  - Belt from (x=-11.5, y=-49.5) to (x=-11.5, y=-51.5) moving up.
  - Belt from (x=-11.5, y=-52.5) to (x=-13.5, y=-52.5) moving left.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting placement. For example, when placing a burner-inserter at position (x=5.0, y=1.5), the placement failed due to an existing wooden chest. Consider adjusting the spacing, direction, or reference position to avoid such conflicts.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
